channel.title: Commands - docs.plakar.io
channel.description: List of supported commands backupcreate a snapshot within a repository catconcatenate and print files checksumcheck health of a repository, snapshot or resource cleanupcheck health of a repository, snapshot or resource clonecreate a clone from an existing repository createcreate a new snapshots repository diffcompare snapshots, directories and files execrun executable from a snapshot findlocate resources within a repository or a snapshot forkduplicate a snapshot with a different snapshot ID gzcatconcatenate and print compressed files

item.title: backup
item.description: create a snapshot within a repository

item.title: cat
item.description: concatenate and print files

item.title: checksum
item.description: check health of a repository, snapshot or resource

item.title: cleanup
item.description: check health of a repository, snapshot or resource

item.title: clone
item.description: create a clone from an existing repository

item.title: create
item.description: create a new snapshots repository

item.title: diff
item.description: compare snapshots, directories and files

item.title: exec
item.description: run executable from a snapshot

item.title: find
item.description: locate resources within a repository or a snapshot

item.title: fork
item.description: duplicate a snapshot with a different snapshot ID

item.title: gzcat
item.description: concatenate and print compressed files

item.title: info
item.description: display information regarding a repository, a snapshot or a resource

item.title: keep
item.description: remove snapshots while retaining the last ones

item.title: ls
item.description: list snapshots or resources

item.title: mount
item.description: mount a repository as a FUSE filesystem

item.title: restore
item.description: restore snapshots or resources

item.title: rm
item.description: remove snapshots from a repository

item.title: shell
item.description: a simple shell

item.title: stdio
item.description: an stdio server

item.title: sync
item.description: synchronize a repository with snapshots from another repository

item.title: tarball
item.description: create a tarball from a snapshot or part of a snapshot

item.title: ui
item.description: run a browser viewer on a repository

item.title: verify
item.description: verify health of a repository, snapshot or resource
